title: 1970 Deluxe Early bay savannah beige narrowed lowered etc

posts.content:
Deluxe Microbus 1970

Its a 70 us import, from ohio in august 2009
9 months mot
100% SOLID
100% original factory savannah beige paint, no rot, its patina, all the orange would polish out if you could bring yourself to do it
all deluxe parts, window trim badge etc
new front & rear screen rubbers
New 1641 with twin 40 webbers & a big engle cam, brand new exhaust etc
been converted to run a 1302 AH code 1500 irs gearbox (4.125 ratio) so the gearing is WAY better than the original box, no crunching or popping out of gear and will sit at 70mph no probs
4'' narrowed widefive beam & flipped spindles
t2d/ creative adjustable springplates
Flat 4 sprints with brand new 165/50/15 front and 165/65/15 rear bridgestone tyres
z hinges that rurn the rear seat into a bed
notched front and rear chassis
complete original minibus interior with freshly recovered front seats
3 point retracting seat belts front and rear
rear indicators are wired through the reverse lights
also got a cab bunk that will go with the bus that fits above the front seats.

Price is Â£11,000 ovno cheers colin.
You can call me on 07598 659 143
not realy in to bays but this one is just right on it

You selling some cool rides at the moment Col!!!!

Lovely Bay.

Sooty wrote:
You selling some cool rides at the moment Col!!!!

Lovely Bay.

Thanks mate, It's a shame this one has to go so soon, did a deal with my brother where he got my beetle and I got this but i'm selling this one for the same reason I sold my deluxe. Col.

Wierd, on the ssvc and I also put the sale ad on today for my sisters early delux bay in savannagh beige??
Cheers Nathan

Keep this to a for sale thread but I bet he had a good Stag Doo!
I'm willing to take offers on the bus, although i could be tempted in a part ex with an early bug (pre 67) early ghia (pre 70) or an early type 3 (pre 70) or WHY? cheers Col.
